reviewText: It was great having this movie with the English subtitles...I previously watched without subtitles and had to figure what was happening but now with subtitles I find I wasn't far off!

Had seen it once and liked it enough to own a copy. I could feel the culture and get the feel of the movie.
I like dramas.
This was a good movie when I first watched it through a streaming site and I decided I would buy it. Thanks to the seller who helped me correct mistakes with delivery, etc.

out of all Refugee was the only film to bring together India and PAkistan Both shake hands together. and Refugee have it.

The performance by every one was great from Jackie to suniel and from Abhiehsk to Kareena. all did a great job
